name: Metamorph_1886
description:
Game about a cursed man on the run, that is constantly switching between his human form and his monster form. This game is heavily inspired by Dr.Jekyll and Mr.Hyde

Created as a part of global game jam 2022 in which participants need to finish a game based on a theme in 48 hours.

This years´s theme was: duality

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/metamorph-1886-2
